entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Matane
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:06 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High minus 7.
